abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: This unit changes into a much stronger version of itself if a Mardroeme is played before or after it.

abilities.name: Commander's Horn
abilities.description: This appears as a non-unit Neutral card (place on any row), or as a character’s ability (affects only the row the character is played on). It doubles the strength of all unit cards in that row. Limit to 1 per row.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: This non-unit Neutral card allows you to swap it with a card on the battlefield to return it to your hand.

abilities.name: Hero
abilities.description: This unit is immune to any special effects or abilities.

abilities.name: Medic
abilities.description: After playing this card, choose one card from the discard pile and play it instantly (no Heroes or Special cards).

abilities.name: Morale Boost
abilities.description: Adds +1 to all units in the row (excluding itself).

abilities.name: Muster
abilities.description: Find any cards with the same name in your deck and play them instantly.

abilities.name: Scorch
abilities.description: Destroy enemy’s strongest unit in a specific row, if the combined strength of all his or her units is 10 or more.

abilities.name: Spy
abilities.description: Place on your opponent’s battlefield and draw 2 cards from your deck.

abilities.name: Tight Bond
abilities.description: Placing this unit next to a card with the same name will double the strength of both cards.
